comments.comment_content:
/**
public class Node {
public char c;
public Node next;

public Node(char c) {
this.c = c;
}
}
**/

public static Node reverse(Node head) {
if(head == null || head.next == null) {
return head;
}

Node prev = null;
Node cur = head;
Node next = head.next;

while(next != null) {
cur.next = prev;
prev = cur;
cur = next;
next = cur.next;
}
cur.next = prev;
return cur;
}


public static boolean existsCircle(Node head) {
Node slow = head;
Node fast = head;
while(fast != null && fast.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
if(slow == fast) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

public static Node merge(Node head1, Node head2) {

Node guard = new Node('/');
Node cur = guard;

while(head1 != null && head2 != null) {
if(head1.c <= head2.c) {
while(head1 != null && head1.c <= head2.c) {
cur.next = head1;
cur = cur.next;
head1 = head1.next;

}
} else {
while(head2 != null && head1.c > head2.c) {
cur.next = head2;
cur = cur.next;
head2 = head2.next;

}
}
}

if(head1 != null) {
cur.next = head1;
}
if(head2 != null) {
cur.next = head2;
}

return guard.next;

}

public static Node deleteLastN(Node head, int n) {
if(n < 1 || head == null) {
return head;
}
Node guard = new Node('/');
guard.next = head;

Node slow = guard;
Node fast = guard;

for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
if(fast != null) {
fast = fast.next;
}
}
while(fast != null && fast.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next;
}
slow.next = slow.next.next;
return guard.next;
}

public static Node getMiddle(Node head, int n) {
Node slow = head;
Node fast = head;

while(fast.next != null && fast.next.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
}

return slow;
}

// A -> B -> C -> D -> E
// ä¸­é—´çŠ¶æ€
// A <- B C -> D -> E
// æ­¤æ—¶Bæ˜¯headerï¼Œcurrentå·²ç»æŒ‡å‘äº†Cï¼Œéœ€è¦ç»è¿‡ä¸€ç•ªæ“ä½œè¾¾åˆ°å¦‚ä¸‹æ•ˆæœ
// A <- B <- C D -> E
// æ­¤æ—¶Cæ˜¯headerï¼Œcurrentå·²ç»æŒ‡å‘äº†D
// æ‰€ä»¥æ“ä½œçš„ä¸»è¦å†…å®¹åˆ†å››æ­¥
// 1. æš‚å­˜current.getNext() å³æš‚å­˜ååŠæˆªï¼Œä¸€ç³»åˆ—æ“ä½œåå°†å®ƒèµ‹å€¼ç»™current
// 2. å°†currentçš„nextè®¾ç½®ä¸ºheader å³è½¬å‘
// 3. é‡è®¾æ–°header å³header = current
// 4. å°†æš‚å­˜çš„ååŠæˆªç»™currentã€‚è¿›å…¥ä¸‹ä¸€è½®
// å…¶ä¸­çš„ç»†èŠ‚æ“ä½œæ˜¯currentæ˜¯å¤´ç»“ç‚¹æ—¶ï¼Œå…¶nextè¦è®¾ç½®ä¸ºnull
public void reverse() {
if (header == null) {
return;
}
SinglyLinkedNode<T> current = header;
while (current != null) {
// 1
SinglyLinkedNode<T> temp = current.getNext();
// 2
if (current == header) {
current.setNext(null);
} else {
current.setNext(header);
}
// 3
header = current;
// 4
current = temp;
}
}

@Data
static class Node{
private Node next;
private Object data;
public Node setNext(Node next){
this.next = next;
return next;
}

public Node(Object data) {
this.data = data;
}

public static Node reverse(Node node,Node next,Node oldHead){
Node head = next.getNext();
next.setNext(node);
if(node == oldHead){
node.setNext(null);
}
if(head == null){
return next;
}
return reverse(next,head,oldHead);
}
}
}

public class Node{

class NodeUtils{
public Node reverseNodeList( Node head){
if(null == head || null == head.next)
return head;
Node p,q,r;
p = head;
q = head.next;
p.next = null;
while(null != q){
r = q.next;
q.next = p;
p = q;
q = r;
}
head = p;
return head;
}
}

public void reverse() {
// ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µ
if (headCursor.next == null || headCursor.next == tailCursor.next) {
return;
}
Node cursorNode = new Node(null, headCursor.next);
// åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤´å°¾æŒ‡é’ˆ
tailCursor.next = headCursor.next;
headCursor.next = null;
// éå† ä¸´ç•Œå€¼ï¼šç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª
while(cursorNode.next != null) {
// æŠŠitemæŠ å‡ºæ¥
Node item = removeNext(cursorNode);
// å¤´æ’æ³•é‡ç»„headCursor
addToFirst(item);
}
}

/**
* æŠŠç»“ç‚¹æ·»åŠ åˆ°å¤´éƒ¨
*/
protected void addToFirst(Node item) {
item.next = headCursor.next;
headCursor.next = item;
}

/**
* åˆ é™¤nextèŠ‚ç‚¹
*/
protected Node removeNext(Node cursorNode) {
Node item = cursorNode.next;
cursorNode.next = cursorNode.next.next;
item.next = null;
return item;
}

/// æ£€æµ‹ç¯ ?
func hasCircle<Element>(head: Node<Element>) -> Bool {
var fast = head.next
var slow: Node<Element>? = head
while fast != nil {
if fast === slow {
return true
}
fast = fast!.next?.next
slow = slow!.next
}
return false
}
è¿™ä¸ªæ€ä¹ˆç†è§£ï¼Œå•¥æ€è·¯ï¼Ÿ

/// åˆ é™¤å€’æ•°ç¬¬nä¸ªç»“ç‚¹ ?
func deleteNode<Element>(at lastNum: Int, in head: Node<Element>) {
var slow: Node<Element>? = head
var fast: Node<Element>? = head
var num = 1
while fast != nil, num < lastNum {
fast = fast!.next
num += 1
}
var prevNode: Node<Element>?
while fast != nil {
prevNode = slow
fast = fast!.next
slow = slow!.next
}
prevNode?.next = slow?.next
}

// ä»¥é“¾è¡¨èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºkeyçš„hashç»“æ„ä½“
struct hashTable {
struct ListNode* keyï¼›
UT_hash_handle ht; // UT_hash_handle ä½¿å®šä¹‰çš„ç»“æ„ä½“å¯å“ˆå¸Œ
}ï¼›

// å®šä¹‰å…¨å±€hashè¡¨
struct hashTable* hashtable;
// hashè¡¨æŸ¥æ‰¾
struct hashTable* find(struct ListNode* key)
{
struct hashTable* tmp;
HASH_FIND_PTR(hashtable, &key, tmp); // å‚æ•°äºŒéœ€è¦ä¼ å…¥å…¥å‚çš„åœ°å€
return tmp;
}

// hashè¡¨æ·»åŠ æ–°æˆå‘˜
void insert(struct ListNode* key)
{
struct hashTable* tmp = malloc(sizeof(struct hashTable));
tmp->key = key;
HASH_ADD_PTR(hashtable, key, tmp); // å‚æ•°ä¸‰ä¸ºéœ€è¦æ·»åŠ åˆ°hashè¡¨çš„ç»“æ„ä½“æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œå‚æ•°äºŒä¸ºhashç»“æ„ä½“keyæˆå‘˜çš„åå­—ï¼›
}

bool hasCycle(struct ListNode* head)
{
hashtable = NULL;
while (head != NULL) {
if (find(head) != NULL) {
return true;
}
insert(head);
head = head->next;
}
return false;
}

struct ListNode* headNodeOfCycle(struct ListNode* head)
{
hashtable = NULL;
while (head != NULL) {
if (find(head) != NULL) {
return find(head)->key;
}
insert(head);
head = head->next;
}
return NULL;
}

class Solution {
public ListNode reverseList(ListNode head) {
ListNode dummy = null;

while(head != null) {

head.next = dummy;
dummy = head;
head = temp;
}

return dummy;
}
}

public static Node mergeSortedLists(Node la, Node lb) {
if (la == null) return lb;
if (lb == null) return la;

Node p = la;
Node q = lb;
Node head;
if (p.data < q.data) {
head = p;
p = p.next;
} else {
head = q;
q = q.next;
}
Node r = head;

while (p != null && q != null) {
if (p.data < q.data) {
r.next = p;
p = p.next;
} else {
r.next = q;
q = q.next;
}
r = r.next;
}

if (p != null) {
r.next = p;
} else {
r.next = q;
}

return head;
}

/**
* @brief å°¾æ’æ³•åˆ›å»ºä¸å¸¦å¤´ç»“ç‚¹çš„å•é“¾è¡¨
* @param array æ•°æ®æ•°ç»„

* @return åˆ›å»ºçš„å•é“¾è¡¨çš„å¤´æŒ‡é’ˆ

ListNode* CreateList(int array[], int sz) {
ListNode* guard = (ListNode*)malloc(sizeof(ListNode)); //å“¨å…µç»“ç‚¹
guard->next = NULL;
ListNode* back = guard;
for (int i=0; i<sz; ++i) {
ListNode* cur = (ListNode*)malloc(sizeof(ListNode));
cur->data = array[i];
back->next = cur;
back = cur;
}
back->next = NULL;
return guard->next;
}

// å•é“¾è¡¨èŠ‚ç‚¹
struct listNode {
int value;
struct listNode *next;
};
// åˆ›å»º
listNode *linkedListCreate(int len) {
listNode *head = new listNode{len, nullptr};
listNode *p = head;
for (int i = 1; i <= len; ++i) {
p->next = new listNode{i, nullptr};
p = p->next;
}
return head;
}

// åˆ é™¤
void del(listNode *head, listNode *elem) {
if (!elem || !head)
return;
listNode *pre = head->next;
while (pre->next->value != elem->value) {
pre = pre->next;
}
pre->next = elem->next;
elem->next = nullptr;
head->value--;
delete elem;
}

p = p->next;

std::cout << "æ”¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨ä¸é“¾è¡¨ä¸­" << std::endl;
return nullptr;
}
return p;
}

Class LinkList():
def __init__(self, head)ï¼š
self._head= head
def add(self, value):
new_node = Node(value, None)
new_node.set_next(self._head)
self._head = new_node
def remove(self, value):
current = self._head
pre = None
found = False
while current != None and not found:
if current.get_next() == value:
found = True
if not pre:
self._head = current.get_next()
else:
pre.set_next(current.get_next())
break
else:
pre = current
current = current.get_next()

def reverse(self):
current = self._head
while current != None:
temp = current
self.remove(current._value)
self.add(temp._value)
current = current.get_next()
return self

public static LinkedNode singleLinkedReverse(LinkedNode node) {

LinkedNode curr = node;

prev = curr;
curr = next;
}

return prev;
}

//h2ä¸ºå•é“¾è¡¨åè½¬å‰æœ€åä¸€ä½å…ƒç´ ã€‚ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯åè½¬åçš„å•é“¾è¡¨çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä½å…ƒç´

public static void reserve(ChainLink head){
ChainLink now = head;
ChainLink next = now.nextNode;
if(next.nextNode == null){
now.nextNode=null;
next.nextNode=now;
}
else{
now = next;
next = next.nextNode;
reserve(now);
}
}
}

Node* FindMidNode(Node* head)
{
if (head == NULL) {
return NULL;
}

Node* pre = head;
Node* rear = head;

while (rear->next != NULL) {
if (rear->next->next != NULL) {
rear = rear->next->next;
}
else {
return pre;
}
pre = pre->next;
}
return pre;
}

bool Check(const node* head)
{
if(head=NULL)
{
return false;
}

node* left=head,*right=head->next;
while(right!=NULL && right->next!=NULL)
{
left=left->next;
right=right->next->next;

if(left==right)
{
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

Node* MergeRecursive(Node* head1,Node* head2)
{
if(head1==NULL)
{
return head2;
}
if(head2==NULL)
{
return head1;
}

Node* head=NULL;
if(head1->data < head2->data)
{
head=head1;
head->next=MergeRecursive(head1->next,head2);
}
else
{
head=head2;
head->next=MergeRecursive(head1,head2->next);
}
return head;
}

public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {
ListNode prehead = new ListNode(-1);

ListNode prev = prehead;
while (l1 != null && l2 != null) {
if (l1.val <= l2.val) {
prev.next = l1;
l1 = l1.next;
} else {
prev.next = l2;
l2 = l2.next;
}
prev = prev.next;
}

prev.next = l1 == null ? l2 : l1;

return prehead.next;
}

void reverse(LinkedList* list) {

}

function nodeReverseIteration(node) {
if (!node || !node.next) {
return node;
}
let curr = node;
let prev = null;
while (curr) {
let temp = curr.next;
curr.next = prev;
prev = curr;
curr = temp;
}
return prev;
}

var reverseListRecursion = function (head) {
if (!head || !head.next) return head;
let res;
function reverse(node) {
if (!node.next.next) {
node.next.next = node;
res = node.next;
} else {
reverse(node.next);
node.next.next = node;
node.next = null;
}
}
reverse(head);
return res;
}

// _util.js
export function getLinkByValue(arr) {
let head = null
if (arr && arr.length > 0) {
for (let i = arr.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
let item = {
value: arr[i],
next: head
}
head = item
}
}
return head
}

export function consoleLogLinkValue(head) {
let p = head
while (p.next !== null) {
console.log(p.value)
p = p.next
}
console.log(p.value)
}

function merge(head1, head2) {
let p1 = head1,
p2 = head2,
arr = []

while (p1.next !== undefined && p2.next !== undefined) {

if (p1.value < p2.value) {
arr.push(p1.value)
p1 = p1.next
} else {
arr.push(p2.value)
p2 = p2.next
}

p1.next = {
next: undefined
}

p2.next = {

}

p1 = p1.next

if (p1.next === null) {
p1.next = {
next: undefined
}
}
}

return arr
}

LPLINKLIST ReverseList(LPLINKLIST lpHead)
{
LPLINKLIST lpNext = NULL;

while(lpHead != NULL)
{
LPLINKLIST lpNode = lpHead->lpNext;
lpHead->lpNext = lpNext;

lpNext = lpHead;
lpHead = lpNode;
}

return lpNext;
}

LPLINKLIST MergeList(LPLINKLIST list1,LPLINKLIST list2)
{
if(list1 == NULL)
{
return list2;
}

if(list2 == NULL)
{
return list1;
}

LPLINKLIST lpHead = (*list1 < * list2) ? list1 : list2;
LPLINKLIST lpBig = (*list1 < * list2) ? list2 : list1;

LPLINKLIST lpSmall = lpHead;

while(lpSmall != NULL)
{
if(lpSmall->lpNext == NULL)
{
lpSmall->lpNext = lpBig;
break;
}

if(*(lpSmall->lpNext) < * lpBig)
{
lpSmall = lpSmall->lpNext;
}
else
{
LPLINKLIST lpNode = lpSmall->lpNext;
lpSmall->lpNext = lpBig;

lpSmall = lpBig;
lpBig = lpNode;
}
}

return lpHead;
}

public void insertTail(int value){

//ç©ºé“¾è¡¨ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ’å…¥æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹ä½œä¸ºheadï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸æ“ä½œ
if (head == null){
head = newNode;

}else{
Node q = head;
while(q.next != null){
q = q.next;
}
newNode.next = q.next;
q.next = newNode;
}
}

å‰è¾ˆä»¬å¥½ï¼Œæˆ‘çœ‹äº†ä½œè€…åœ¨GitHubä¸Šçš„c++å•é“¾è¡¨å®ç°ä»£ç ï¼ˆlinked_list_algo.hppï¼‰ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æœ‰ä¸€å—ä¸€ç›´æ²¡çœ‹æ˜ç™½ï¼š
template <typename T, typename UnaryFunc>
void traverse(typename Node<T>::ptr_t head, UnaryFunc do_traverse) {
auto sentry = std::make_shared<Node<T>>();
sentry->next = head;

listNode *mergeTwoLists(listNode *l1,listNode *l2)
{
listNode head = {0};
listNode *pRes = &head;

while(1)
{
if(l1 == NULL)
{
pRes->next = l2;
}

if (l2 == NULL)
{
pRes->next = l1;
}

if(l1->val < l2->val)
{
pRes->next = l1;
l1 = l1->next;
}
else
{
pRes->next = l2;
l2 = l2->next;
}
pRes = pRes->next;
}

return head;
}

const removeNthFromEnd = function(head, n) {
let dummy = new ListNode(0);
dummy.next = head;
let length = 0;
let first = head;
while (first != null) {
length++;
first = first.next;
}
length -= n;
first = dummy;
while (length > 0) {
length--;
first = first.next;
}
first.next = first.next.next;
return dummy.next;
}

* @param node

public static boolean circleCheck(Node node) {
if (node == null || node.next == null) {
return false;
}
Node slowNode = node, fastNode = node.next;
while (fastNode != null) {
slowNode = slowNode.next;
fastNode = fastNode.next == null? null : fastNode.next.next;
if (slowNode == fastNode || slowNode.next == fastNode) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}

public ListNode getMiddleNode(ListNode head) {

public function __construct()
{

$this->size = 0;
}

// æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹
public function add($index,$value) {
if($index > $this->size) {
echo "è¶…å‡ºé“¾è¡¨èŒƒå›´<br/>";
return false;
}
$prev = $this->head;
for($i=0;$i<$index;$i++) {
$prev = $prev->nextNode;
}
$prev->nextNode = new Node($value,$prev->nextNode);
$this->size++;
return true;
}
// æ’å…¥æ•°æ®åˆ°é“¾è¡¨å¤´
public function addFirst($value) {
$this->add(0,$value);
}

// è¡¨å°¾æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
public function addLast($value) {
$this->add($this->size,$value);
}

// æ›´æ”¹æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®çš„æ•°æ®
public function edit($index,$value) {
if ($index < 1) {
echo "å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å¯ä»¥ä¿®æ”¹<br/>";
return false;
}
if ($index > $this->size) {
echo "è¶…å‡ºé“¾è¡¨èŒƒå›´<br/>";
return false;
}
$prev = $this->head->nextNode; // å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼ä¸èƒ½ä¿®æ”¹
for($i=1;$i<=$index;$i++){
if($i==$index) {
$prev->val = $value; // ä¿®æ”¹å€¼
}
$prev = $prev->nextNode;
}
return true;
}



// åˆ é™¤æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®èŠ‚ç‚¹
public function deleteNode($index) {
if ($index < 1) {
echo "å“¨å…µèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å¯ä»¥åˆ é™¤<br/>";
return false;
}
if ($index > $this->size) {
echo "è¶…å‡ºé“¾è¡¨èŒƒå›´<br/>";
return false;
}
$prev = $this->head;
for($i=1;$i<=$index;$i++){
if($i==$index) {
$tempNode = $prev->nextNode;
$prev->nextNode = $prev->nextNode->nextNode;
unset($tempNode);
}
$prev = $prev->nextNode;
}
$this->size--;
return true;
}

}
}

}

func reverseList(head *ListNode) *ListNode {
if head == nil {
return head
}
p := head
for p.Next != nil {
tmp := p.Next
p.Next = p.Next.Next
tmp.Next = p
head = tmp
}
return head
}

public NodeImpl revers() {
if (head.next == null) {
return this;
}
Node pre = head.next;
Node cur = pre.next;
pre.next = null;
Node tmp;
head.next = null;
while (cur != null) {
tmp = cur.next;
cur.next = pre;

pre = cur;
cur = tmp;
}
head.next = pre;
return this;
}

public class Test02 {
static class NodeImpl {
Node head;
public NodeImpl(Node head) {
this.head = head;
}
public NodeImpl add(Node node) {
if (head.next == null) { head.next = node;return this; }
Node cur = head.next;
while (cur.next != null) { cur = cur.next; }
cur.next = node;
return this;
}
public NodeImpl del(Node node) {
if (head.next == null) { return this; }
Node cur = head.next, pre = head;
while (cur != null) {
if (cur.a == node.a) { pre.next = cur.next;break; } else { pre = cur;cur = cur.next; }
}
return this;
}
public void list() { Node cur = head.next;if (cur == null) { System.out.println("é“¾è¡¨ä¸ºç©º");return; }while (cur != null) { System.out.println(cur.a);cur = cur.next; } }
public NodeImpl revers() {
Node cur = head.next, newNode = new Node(0), pre;
while (cur != null) {
pre = cur;
cur = cur.next;
if (newNode.next == null) {
pre.next = null;
newNode.next = pre;
} else {
pre.next = newNode.next;
newNode.next = pre;
}
}
setHead(newNode);
return this;
}
public void setHead(Node head) { this.head = head; }
}

}

function findOne(array $array,int $n,int $key)
{
// å¤„ç†è¾¹ç•Œé—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¦‚æœaä¸ºç©ºï¼Œæˆ–è€…n<=0,è¯´æ˜æ•°ç»„ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼Œå°±ä¸ç”¨whilel
if($array == null || $n <= 0)
{
return -1;
}

$i = 0;
while($i < $n)
{
if($array[$i] == $key)
{
return $i;
}
++$i;
}

return -1;
}

function findTwo(array $array,int $n,int $key)
{
if($array == null || $n <= 0)
{
return -1;
}

if($array[$n -1] == $key)
{
return $n -1;
}

$tmp = $array[$n -1];
$array[$n -1] = $key;

$i = 0;
while($array[$i] != $key)
{
++$i;
}

// æ¢å¤åŸæ¥çš„å€¼
$array[$n -1] = $tmp;

if($i == $n - 1){
return -1;
}else{
return $i;
}

}

public void reverse() {
if (head == null) {
return;
}
// åˆå§‹é¦–èŠ‚ç‚¹
Node<E> originalHead = head;
Node<E> next = null;
while ((next = originalHead.next) != null) {
// åˆ é™¤next
originalHead.next = next.next;

// æ’å…¥åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä½
next.next = head;

// æ›´æ–°head
head = next;
}
}

è¿”å›:

public ListNode RemoveNthFromEnd(ListNode head, int n) {
ListNode dummy = new ListNode(0);
dummy.next = head;
ListNode first = dummy;
ListNode end = dummy;

for(int i = 1;i<=n+1;i++)
{
first = first.next;
}

while(first != null)
{
first = first.next;
end = end.next;
}

end.next = end.next.next;

return dummy.next;
}

class NodeUtils{
public Node reverseNodeList( Node head){
if(null == head || null == head.next)
return head;
Node p,q,r;
p = head;
q = head.next;
p.next = null;
while(null != q){
r = q.next;
q.next = p;
p = q;
q = r;
}
head = p;
return head;
}
}

Node* reverse_by_loop(Node* head)
{
if(!head || !head->next)
return;

Node* pre = NULL;
Node* next = NULL;
while(head)
{
next = head->next;
head->next = pre;
pre = head;
head = next;
}
}

import java.io.Serializable;

/**
* @version 1.0
* @since 2019-08-16.
*/
public class ListReverse<E> implements Serializable {

private Node<E> head;

private Node<E> tail;

public ListReverse() {
head = null;
tail = null;
}

public void add(E e) {
if (e == null)
throw new NullPointerException();
Node<E> newNode = new Node<>(e, null);
if (head == null) {
head = tail = newNode;
} else {
tail.next = newNode;
tail = tail.next;
}
}

public void reverseList() {
Node<E> first = head;
Node<E> prev = head;
Node<E> tmp = head;
for (; first != null; ) {
first = first.next;
if (prev.equals(head)) {
prev.next = null;
} else {
prev.next = tmp;
tmp = prev;
}
prev = first;
}
tmp = head;
head = tail;
tail = tmp;
}

@Override
public String toString() {
Node<E> first = head;
StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
builder.append("[");
for (; first != null; ) {
builder.append(first.ele);
if (first.next == null) {
builder.append("]");
} else {
builder.append(", ");
}
first = first.next;
}
return builder.toString();
}

private static class Node<E> {

E ele;

Node<E> next;

public Node(E ele, Node<E> next) {
this.ele = ele;
this.next = next;
}
}
}

public static void main(String[] args){

int[] arr = new int[]{1, 24, 66, 76, 2, 89};

// test
System.out.println(find(arr, arr.length, 76));
System.out.println(find0(arr, arr.length, 76));
}

// find and find0
// compare...

private static int find(int[] arr, int n, int key) {
int i = 0;
while (i < n) {
if (arr[i] == key) {
break;
}
i++;
}
return i < n ? i : -1;
}

private static int find0(int[] arr, int n, int key) {

if (arr[n - 1] == key) return n - 1;

int tmp = arr[n - 1];
arr[n - 1] = key;

int i = 0;
while (arr[i] != key) i++;

arr[n - 1] = tmp;

return n - 1 == i ? -1 : i;
}

let origin = "123456"
var list : [ListNode?] = [ListNode?]()

for cha in origin.reversed() {
let node = ListNode(cha: cha)
node.next = list.last as? ListNode
list.append(node)
}

let ispolind = polindRome(head: list.last as? ListNode)
print(ispolind)

}

func polindRome(head:ListNode?) -> Bool {

if head == nil || head?.next == nil {
return false
}

var prev:ListNode? = nil
var slow:ListNode? = head
var fast:ListNode? = head

while fast != nil && fast?.next != nil {
fast = fast?.next?.next
let temp = slow?.next

slow?.next = prev
prev = slow
slow = temp

}

if fast != nil {
slow = slow?.next
}

while slow != nil {
// print("\(String(describing: slow?.value)) --- \(String(describing: prev?.value))")
if slow?.value != prev?.value {

return false
}
slow = slow?.next
prev = prev?.next
}


return true
}

}

linkNode* linkReversal(linkNode* link) {
if (!link) return NULL;
linkNode *p = link->next;//pæŒ‡å‘ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹

//æŠŠç¬¬pèŠ‚ç‚¹åé¢çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸€æ¬¡æ’å…¥åˆ°å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„åé¢

void deleteLastKth(SinglyLinkedNode** head_ref, int k) {
if (*head_ref == NULL || k == 0) return;

// å¿«æŒ‡é’ˆå‘å‰ç§»åŠ¨ k-1
SinglyLinkedNode* fast = *head_ref;
int i = 1;
while (i < k && fast != NULL) {
fast = fast->next;
++i;
}

// å¦‚æœå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆä¸ºç©ºï¼Œè¯´æ˜ç»“ç‚¹ä¸ªæ•°å°äº k
if (fast == NULL) return;

SinglyLinkedNode* slow = *head_ref;
SinglyLinkedNode* prev = NULL;
while (fast->next != NULL) {
fast = fast->next;
prev = slow;
slow = slow->next;
}

// å¦‚æœ prev ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¤´ç»“ç‚¹åˆšå¥½æ˜¯ç¬¬ k ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹
if (!prev) {
(*head_ref) = (*head_ref)->next;
} else {
prev->next = slow->next;
}
free(slow);
}

public Node hebing(Node node1, Node node2){
Node node3 = null;
while(node1 != null || node2 != null) {
Node n = new Node();
if (node1 == null) {
getLastNode(node3).next = node2;
break;
} else if (node2 == null) {
getLastNode(node3).next = node1;
break;
} else if (node1.data > node2.data) {
n.data = node2.data;
node2 = node2.next;
} else if (node1.data <= node2.data) {
n.data = node1.data;
node1 = node1.next;
}

if (node3 == null) {
node3 = n;
} else {
getLastNode(node3).next = n;
}

}
return node3;
}


/**
* è·å–é“¾è¡¨çš„æœ€åä¸€çº§
*/
public Node getLastNode(Node node){
while (node != null){
if (node.next == null) {
return node;
} else {
node = node.next;
}
}
return null;
}

ã€Œè™½ç„¶ä¸æ˜¯æˆ‘æƒ³çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è§£æ³•çœŸå¿ƒä¼˜ç§€ã€
è§£é¢˜æ€æƒ³ï¼šå¿«æŒ‡é’ˆæ¯”æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆå¿«Nä¸ªå•å…ƒï¼Œæ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘å¾…åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹.
public ListNode removeNPosition(int n, ListNode original){
if(original == null){
return null;
}
int i = 0;
ListNode fast = original;
ListNode slow = original;
while ( i == n-1){
fast = fast.next;
i++;
}
if(fast == null){
return fast.next;
}
while( fast.next != null){
fast = fast.next;
slow = slow.next;
}
slow.next = slow.next.next;
return original;
}

// æ£€æµ‹ç¯
public static boolean checkCircle(Node list) {
if (list == null) return false;

Node fast = list.next;
Node slow = list;

while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {
fast = fast.next.next;
slow = slow.next;

if (slow == fast) return true;
}

return false;
}

// å•é“¾è¡¨åè½¬
public static Node reverse(Node list) {
if (null == list) {
return null;
}
Node last = new Node(list.data,null);
while (list.next != null) {
Node next = new Node(list.next.data,last);
last = next;
list = list.next;
}
return last;
}

public static Node reverseLinkedList(Node node) {
if (node == null || node.next == null) {
return node;
} else {
Node headNode = reverseLinkedList(node.next);
node.next.next = node;
node.next = null;
return headNode;
}
}
}

**æ‹“å±•**ï¼šåœ¨å¾ˆå¤šç®—æ³•ä¸­éƒ½æœ‰ç”¨åˆ°å“¨å…µåšç®€åŒ–ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æ’å…¥æ’åºã€å½’å¹¶æ’åºã€åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ç­‰ã€‚

```
inf find(char* a, int n, int key) {
if (a[n-1] == key) {
return n-1;
}
char tmp = a[n-1];
a[n-1] = key;
int i = 0;
while (a[i] != key) {
++i;
}
a[n-1] = tmp;
if (i == n-1) return -1;
return i;
}
```
